body: There could potentially be a bug in the stage, but note that your reproducer for sure has a bug - you must not have mutable state that you touch from multiple threads, which is exactly what is happening with the `count` var, additionally `+=` and `-=` are not atomic operations, to create a correct reproducer you should use an `AtomicInteger`. Please update the reproducer and see if you can still see multiple closes.
Sounds like a bug then, thanks for verifying. Would you be up for giving submitting a fix a chance?

issue.title: UnfoldResourceSource closing twice on failure

labels.name: tested
labels.description: PR that was successfully built and tested by Jenkins
